resources.string: This View should display the music available sorted by category type or artist
This View should view the top ranking music based on number of times listened to or purchased
This View should have what the user had favored previously
This View should have all the music tha has been saved
This View should have the ability to search the whole music library
This View should simply View what the user is playing right now and nothing else we should use for this either MediaPlayer or AudioManager classes
